title: 2D/3D MPI-Based Orbital Dynamics Simulations
description: Particle-Based, first-order, orbital dynamics simulations with direct MPI transfer and efficient scaling for Michigan's computing cluster SLURM. Legacy VTK output with Paraview for visualizations

title: Distributed Document Translation Service
description: Rust-based multi-threading wrapper around HuggingFace's MarianMT LLM. Designed to take in a large directory of text documents and translate them into a target language, preserving format.

title: Moon Phobos Simulation Research
description: Simulation, Visualization, and Analysis of wheel-particle interactions by leveraging Chrono's DEM Engine

title: Instagram Clone
description: Web app designed to replicate the dynamic layout and functionality of Instagram with concurrent users

title: Jiu Jitsu Website
description: User Interface and Secure Payment Gateway for Michigan's Club Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Team
